properties.description:
Partitioning doesn't apply when loading in "load_type":"year_overwrite" cause CODIGO doesn't have any relation to ANO. For this case , current year is automatically loaded, so as it is only 1 year, we can't also partition this by year (will lead to only 1 partition).

- For full load use:
tables = ["{'schema': 'INDDESEMPENHO', 'table':'CENTRORESPONSABILIDADE','load_type':'full','partition_column':'null', 'columns': 'ANO,CODIGO,NOME', 'raw':  {'partition_by': [{'col_name': 'ANO'}], 'coalesce': 1}}"]

- For "year_overwrite" load use:
tables = ["{'schema': 'INDDESEMPENHO', 'table':'CENTRORESPONSABILIDADE','load_type':'year_overwrite','control_column_filter_type':'current', 'partition_column':'null', 'control_column':'ano', 'control_column_mask_value': 'YYYY','columns': 'ANO,CODIGO,NOME', 'raw': {'partition_by': [{'col_name': 'ANO'}], 'coalesce': 1}}"]

As this object is really small, you can add: 'raw':{'coalesce': 1}
